text: Clement (), (? – after 1667) was Ecumenical Patriarch of Constantinople for 42 days in 1667. He was the metropolitan of Iconium when he was elected Patriarch on 9 September 1667. He was an uneducated and brusque person and his election was not recognised. The Holy Synod protested to Sultan Mehmet IV, who dismissed him on 21 October 1667. ==Sources== *Ecumenical Patriarchate Category:1667 Category:17th-century Greek people Category:17th-century Ecumenical Patriarchs of Constantinople Category:Ecumenical Patriarchs of Constantinople Category:Bishops of Iconium
title: Clement of Constantinople
